Articles.Content:
Im sure many of you have heard of Siri

Heres examples of the game.

Player1 siri what time is it.

Player2 the Time is 12:00

Heres some rules

No derailment

No side conversations

No MLP content or related content

Forum rules apply.

I will start

Siri where is france?

No MLP content or related content

Oh come on!

*throat clearing*

France is around 46Ã‚Â°00'N, 2Ã‚Â°00'E.

Siri, why do you think that the answer to The Ultimate Question of Life, the Universe, and Everything is 42?
(What does MLP mean?)

(What does MLP mean?)

Don't look under that rock...

I am sorry but what do you mean by "dont look under that rock"

keeping the thread on topic.

Siri is google voice your friend?

Edited March 10, 2014 by Dooz

It's ok.

Siri who's your daddy?

Edited March 10, 2014 by AletzN1

You are.

Siri why do you spell Kerbal curveball.

I don't know curveball. I've checked online for curveball. There are two curveball related places fairly close to you.

Siri, do you like eating lard?

I have Never Tried Lard Before.

Siri Will you Marry me?

I'm afraid I cannot do that

I don't know what Siri sounds like, but my samsung has the same feature

Siri.

Edited March 12, 2014 by TheCanadianVendingMachine

Yes, TheCanadianVendingMachine?

Where's the best place to send my Kerbals?

Kerbal not found. I tried searching but only found "Kerbal Space Program" but is irrelevant.

Where am I?

You are in the Universe, Virgo Supercluster, Local Group, Milky Way, Orion Arm, Solar System, Earth.

Where can I eat?

I have Found Several Restaurants Fairly close to you.

Can You Show me how to Get rich Siri?

I have found 84 drug lords that are hiring within a 5 mile radius of your location.

Siri, how do I breathe?

I do not know how to "breathe" as I am a program.

Where can I sell my Iphone.

You can sell it on Ebay or Have it refurbished at apple for Money.

Siri Can you Build me a Stock replica Of the Boeing 747 in Ksp.

I am afraid I do not understand what that means.

Do you want me to search it on the internet?

Siri, what do you think of Microsoft's Cortana voice recognition?

I wasn't programmed to talk about other company product.

Siri, what do you know about 4Chan?

There is no 4Chan, there is only Skynet.

Siri, are you friends with Evie or Cleverbot?
